mean_cn: adj. 字面上的；照字面的；缺乏想像力的
mean_en: being the most basic meaning of a word or phrase, rather than an extended or poetic meaning
sentence: In contracts all word meanings are literal, whereas in literature they can be figurative.
sentence_trans: 合同中所有文字都是字面意思，然而在文学中它们可能有比喻意义。
word_etyma: liter文字，字母 + al形容词后缀 → literal文字上的，字面上的
